page.title: 06PLAYGROUND GAMES IN ALVES
page.content: Some playground games boys play are football, British Bulldogs,hide and seek and Cut the Cake. My favourites are football and British Bulldogs. In football we change the rules a bit. There is only one goalmouth and one goaly who is also the referee. There are two teams which play each other and when they stop playing the team with the most goals wins. British Bulldogs we play on the grass because it is quite a rough game. One person is "it", then he names someone and that person tries to get past the catcher. If he does get past the rest of the people then charge. If the catcher gets someone down that person is then a catcher too. This goes on until everyone is caught.
